name: Bunny Balloons
description:
The Viking Bunnies are back and this time they are ready to pop an armada of balloons for great prizes! (Apparenty Captain Fuzzy believes these balloons to be monsters ... so just go with it.) Using their trusty cannon aboard The Bunny Ship, blast the balloons overhead as they come your way with an array of colorful cannonballs. Just don't let the balloons (as well as dynomite, fireballs, and spike balloons) damage The Bunny Ship because nobody wants that. How many balloons can you pop? Is there gold in those balloons?

- Play Adventure, Arcade, or Blaster Mode
- Play through 1000 Levels in Adventure Mode! Save Your Quest Status!
- Collect Several Powerups to help you pop balloons!
- Visit www.vikingbunnies.com for more Apps for The Viking Bunnies!
